text: (O pravakta!) Inka ila anu: "Niscayanga, nenu kuda milanti oka manavudane! Napai divyajnanam (vahi) avatarimpajeyabadindi. Niscayanga, mi aradhya devudu a ekaika daivam (allah) matrame! Kavuna tana prabhuvunu kalusukovalani asincevadu satkaryalu ceyali. Mariyu aradhanalo tana prabhuvuto patu marevvarini bhagasvamuluga (sarik luga) kalpincukoradu
